channel.title: Exilation 718/736 [Requesting]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/TIVnD.png[/img] [B]Homepage[/B]: [url=http://Exilation.com]Exilation | Experience The Best[/url]
I'm The owner of Exilation, Lately i've Had problems with my coders And made me lose my playerbase. But im rebuilding i got hte backup in the vps again that i had in my desktop. it has alot of features and im looking to Hire a new developer to help me Developing!.
What do i need?. Well you need to atleast have 3-4years JAVA. You need to not leech and know how to code. :penguin: You need to act Mature in the community!.
Form: Name: Age: Years Of Coding: Projects & Links: Why do you want to develop?: Any other information?: Do you agree that this is a Non-paid position?, And you will not Steal Donations Or release the work if you are going to quit.:
Thank You. Best Regards Trevor - Exilation Leadership.[/center]

item.title: Exilation 718/736 [Requesting]
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:5, topic:470958”]Do you agree that this is a Non-paid position?, And you will not Steal Donations Or release the work if you are going to quit.:

how about putting 50% of profit back in to the server and the other 50% is shared equally? else love off[/quote]

Agreed… 50% should go to the server, the other 50% should be split between the everyone, including the owner… The owner has equal rights, as well as the coder and co-owner… Everyone would have to make at least some type of money, just to make it fair… Not on that… Yeah… I agree with KempiScape…

Read full topic

item.title: Exilation 718/736 [Requesting]
item.dc:creator: @Ir0ny Ir0ny
item.description:
@Ir0ny wrote:

Name: Bryce
Age: 16
Years Of Coding: 4

Projects & Links: I have done a bit of work on 718+ projects and 317’s however I prefer to make gfx and website design.
http://i.imgur.com/ZNEPd.png [Something I made ages ago, lost my current work with new comp]

Why do you want to develop?: I like working in teams, when it comes to things like this I know many people through runescape clanning and pking so advertising is no problem. I also like to work professionally.

Any other information?: I also have skills with video editing and I use programs such as Vegas Pro.

Do you agree that this is a Non-paid position?, And you will not Steal Donations Or release the work if you are going to quit.: I dont join projects with the intention of making money, my aim is to have fun and learn so that I can further enjoy what I can create. I find that its great to get to know new people and share ideas as well.

Skype: bsccm23

Read full topic
